DOC.brief_summary: At time , study examine effect lifestyle intervention reduce Sedentary Behavior ( SB ) prescription overall physical activity , weight loss , metabolic dysfunction , inflammation breast cancer survivor . Thus , collaboration University Tennessee Medical Center 's ( UTMC ) Cancer Institute , investigator propose randomize 30 female breast cancer survivor ( history breast cancer stag I [ > 1 cm ] , II , III ) body mass index ( BMI ) 25 45 kg/m2 sedentary ( engage > 8 hour day SB ) inactive ( engage < 100 min/wk MVPA ) one three , 3-month condition : 1. lifestyle intervention ( Lifestyle ) ( increase MVPA > 200 min/wk ) ; 2. lifestyle intervention reduce SB prescription ( Lifestyle+SB ) ( increase MVPA > 200 min/wk reduce SB 2 hrs/day ) ; 3. weight management education material provide via mail newsletter ( Newsletter ) . Lifestyle Lifestyle+SB receive standard dietary ( low-calorie [ 1200-1500 kcal/day ] , low-fat [ < 30 % calorie fat ] ) prescription emphasize intake fruit , vegetable , whole grain , cognitive behavioral intervention assist meeting activity diet goal . Dependent variable , measure 0 3 month , include objectively measure SB , LPA , MVPA , total activity via accelerometry ; self-reported SB ; percent weight loss ; insulin glucose , leptin C-reactive protein ( CRP ) ( biomarkers cancer prognosis find positively related SB and/or adiposity ) ; diet ; body composition ; fitness .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Healthy Lifestyle Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 65 yr 2 . BMI 25 45 kg/m2 3. history breast cancer ( stage I [ > 1 cm ] , II , III ) diagnose within previous 5 year 4. completion initial therapy 5. engage > 8 hour day SB 6. engage < 100 min/wk MVPA . 1. report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) 25 ( The Health Screening Questionnaire also use identify individual joint problem , prescription medication usage , medical condition could limit exercise , individual require obtain write physician consent participate two questionnaire find question 411 phone screen Appendix B ) 2. report unable walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop 3. report major psychiatric disease organic brain syndrome 4. report serious medical condition weight loss contraindicate 5. currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month 6. bariatric surgery planning bariatric surgery next 6 month 7. participate program increase physical activity and/or decrease sedentary time 8. intend move outside metropolitan area within time frame investigation 9. pregnant , lactating , < 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant investigation 10. unwilling attend session and/or unwilling randomize treatment condition ; 11. smartphone run app require Polar速 Loop device ; 12. unwilling use MyFitnessPal Polar速 Loop device app smartphones ; 13. metal allergy able wear anything upper arm ( would prevent ability participant wear SenseWear速 armband BodyMedia速 use propose study ) .
